input.activity_signal: Company appears inactive based on: 1) Last FCC filing was in 2017 with no recent activity, 2) Web search results consistently use past tense ("was a telecommunications vendor", "was a telecommunications company"), 3) Wikipedia entry describes it in past tense, 4) Current web presence limited to legacy product listings and historical references rather than active business operations
input.product_summary: ShoreTel was a telecommunications vendor that provided unified communications systems and IP-based business phone systems primarily for enterprises and large businesses.
